E-Mail Messages
Date: Wednesday, 5/1/1973
Subject: Progress of Chet Lemon
Dear Sir,
Chet Lemon has nothing more to prove at AA Knoxville Sox!
He has an AVG of .315 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 5/1/1973
Subject: Progress of Frank LaCorte
Dear Sir,
Frank LaCorte has an ERA of 1.89 at A Appleton Foxes!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director
